name: Frail Flasks
description:
Frail Flasks is all about the chaos unstable potions bring with them. Prevent potions from exploding by trying to reach a stable brew.

The game can be played with mouse only, drag and drop the potions to add to the brew and use right mouse button to pan the camera. But watch out, if you do not handle the bottles with care you will drop them!

Professor: 

"Dear students, today is the day! Final alchemy exam, your task is simple. Craft a potion starting from this one! Beware unstable potions will explode."

Student: 

But professor, that potion is impossible, the process is way too unstable!"

Professor: 

"Yes, yes it will be hard. Anyways, here you have the potions to start from! I will be going to the room next door… just a matter of not exploding."

  Student: 

"Pfff, I could have studied game design…"
